content: मलिनयति <ab>Den.</ab> <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To make dirty, soil, stain, defile, sully, spoil (<ab>fig.</ab> also); वक्त्रोष्मणा मलिनयंति पुरोगतानि <ls>R. 5. 73</ls>; यदामेधाविनी शिष्योपदेशं मलिनयति तदाचार्यस्य दोषो ननु <ls>M. 1</ls> ‘stains or brings discredit on’ &c. {@--2@} To corrupt, deprave.
